bibl.title: Litura: ἀλειφάς, not ἄλειφαρ, and Other Words for 'Erasure'.
bibl.note: When a papyrus has αλειφατος, it should be accentuated ἀλειφάτος with a note: read ἀλειφάδος. Ἄλειφαρ simply never occurs in papyri. Observations on the methods of correction and their designation in Greek.
bibl.seg: BÜLOW-JACOBSEN Adam, Hélène CUVIGNY and Klaas A. WORP, Litura: ἀλειφάς, not ἄλειφαρ, and Other Words for 'Erasure'.

When a papyrus has αλειφατος, it should be accentuated ἀλειφάτος with a note: read ἀλειφάδος. Ἄλειφαρ simply never occurs in papyri. Observations on the methods of correction and their designation in Greek.
